resources.string: To participate in Sristi \'16, you must register. Registration Fee is Rs. 250 with additional Rs. 50 as security deposit per participant before the events starts. The security money will be refunded as soon as the fest gets over. Participants are need to register in the register panel of Sristi 2k16 website by Signing up.

After registration, you can sign-in with required Username and password. A User Profile will be opened in which the instructions regarding all the fest details will be properly given. You have to bring the SRISTI I-CARD before coming to attend the fest. Option for Downloading your I-CARD is given in the User Profile.
Why there is a need to register?

As told above, you can sign-in to your profile after registration only. This allows you to have your SRISTI I-CARD which is required for the participation in the events or the availing accommodation. You can participate in the only Online Treasure Hunt Game of Sristi â€™16 which is free of cost. Note: Only the registered users can participate in the Online Game.
How to pay the registration fee?

There is no online mode payment. Participants can report to campus and can do the payment by cash there itself thus, completing the registration formalities after online registration itself. The registration fee is Rs. 300 per participant including the caution money of Rs. 50. That will include participation in all the events and competitions (except Exhibition), and the accommodation.

And as for accommodation, accommodation will be provided for free by the Sristi \'16 by the Organizing Committee. Just you have to carry the I-CARD and the registration slip with yourself which will be provided to you after the payment. However, accommodation will be provided on the first come first serve basis. Refreshment facility is not included in accommodation.
How would we get to know about description of the event?
The website is provided with all the description of the event. Stay updated, and you will get to know the schedule of each event very soon.
Is there anything I need to carry with myself at Sristi?

You must need to carry your SRISTI I-CARD with yourself to participate at any of the event. You have to take care of your own belongings if you are carrying some. For missing of any of your belongings, Sristi Committee is not responsible for the same.
If you face any problem or if you have any query or if you have any technical or any others suggestions, feedback, please report us. We will response through email as soon as possible.

Sristi 2'16,
The Largest techfest in North Bengal.
Kindly Share this app and help us to distribute Sristi.
Download Link here : http://sristi.org.in,
Thank you very much, have a nice day.

The rich legacy of SRISTI gets a new expression in manual robotics. Here is an event that stimulates minds to innovate themselves and practically realize their ideas to achieve new heights. As you all know about the Eagle, it has sharp visions and can achieve great heights, but, more importantly it has a strong pair of Claws which help them to snatch almost anything they want anytime. We have this manual competition which is all about the perfection and efficiency. Follow the path as fast as possible, clinch the objects and place them perfectly while maintaining a sheer control over the zipline and survive the atmosphere.

1. A team may consist of a maximum of 4 members. 2. Students from different educational institutes can form a team. 3. All students with a valid identity card(college id/library id) of their respective educational institutes are eligible to participate.
